content: संवह् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To carry or bear along, drag. {@--2@} To carry together. {@--3@} To rub, press. {@--4@} To show, display. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To rub or press together, shampoo; संवाहयामि चरणावुत पद्मताम्रौ <ls>Ś. 3. 21.</ls> {@--2@} To assemble, collect. {@--3@} To drive (a carriage). {@--4@} To marry, take a wife. {@--5@} To carry away, drive along, impel; <ls>Pt. 5. 15.</ls>
